text: Stanisław Tarło (died 1599/1601) was a Polish noble (szlachcic). The son of Chorąży of Lwów Jan Tarło and Regina z Malczyc, he married Barbara Dulska in about 1593. They had two children together, Paweł Tarło and Jan Karol Tarło. He was starost of Sochaczew and Zwoleń. Category:16th-century births Category:Year of death uncertain Stanislaw
title: Stanisław Tarło
